articles.description: During the series, PCB chief Ramiz Raja, impressed with England ‘Bazball’ theory, advised Pakistan captain Babar Azam to "pick T20 players" for Tests. Babar shut Ramiz's statement with a strong remark. | Cricket
articles.content: Pakistan lost by eight wickets on Tuesday against England in the third and final Test match in Karachi. The defeat resulted in Pakistan's first ever whitewash in a Test series at home and their first… [+1896 chars]

articles.content: Dean Elgar: 'Is that a good advertisement for our format?'

articles.title: Kandy Falcons vs Jaffna Kings, Qualifier 1, Lanka Premier League 2022 - Cricbuzz

articles.content: 19:00 Local Time, 13:30 GMT, 19:00 IST: The game has been abandoned. Jaffna win on DLS and move to the final. They started the chase in a hurry taking 18 off Isuru Udana's first over and never looked… [+414 chars]
